tool_description: This api provides you 30 random shoes ..
name: Shoes collections
title: Shoes collections

api_list.name: Get a specific item
api_list.description: This will return a specific item from the collection ..,simpily write the id of the product and you will get the product
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shoes-collections.p.rapidapi.com/shoes/3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shoes-collections.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
